snippet: Mr. Abu Ghaith, a son-in-law of Osama bin Laden and a former spokesman for Al Qaeda, was taken into American custody in Jordan and is facing numerous charges, including material support for terrorism.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Abu Ghaith, a son-in-law of Osama bin Laden and a former spokesman for Al Qaeda, was taken into American custody in Jordan and is facing numerous charges, including material support for terrorism.

headline.main: Official Indictment Against Sulaiman Abu Ghaith
